page.title: 19CUSTOMS AND EVENTS
page.content: These are some of the yearly events in the village of Withernwick. {The Garden Party}is at Mill House.At the Garden Party there are games, raffles,Tombola and things that you can buy. {Sports Day}is every year in June at Aldbrough School.We compete against Aldbrough in various races.Then we have an Inter School Sports.Five schools take part at different schools each year. {The W.I.Christmas Party }for children begins at 4p.m. There are always some balloons to blow up and play with. After tea there is a fancy dress,not everybody has to enter. At the end there is a disco that lasts for 1 hr. At the {Darby & Joan Christmas Party} the school children play their recorders and guitars.Everyone has an enjoyable time.
